page.title: 11AROUND KINGS CAPLE
page.content: Pennoxstone is a fruit farm where people come to pick their own raspberries, peas, sweetcorn, and other things. 25 tons of strawberries were sent to market last year, mostly to Birmingham. 88 tons of cider apples were sent to Hereford. If the full trays of strawberries had been stacked up, the stack would have been 3000 feet high. Aramstone is a grassland farm with beef cattle and some horses. Sometimes they have a Field Sports Fair with gun dog trials, falconry, lurcher racing and fly casting competitions. There is a salmon in a glass case which weighed over 59 lbs when it was caught here.
